abstract: He's leaving home--Room with a queue--Men behaving sadly
description: Episode number 6 of Series "This life". 'He's leaving home': The search for a suitable going away present for Warren is on, as is someone to replace him. Jo, Kira and Ferdy do lunch and Warren has his going away party. 'Room with a queue': Kira's still keeping Jo at arm's length, Miles calls a house meeting but they are unable to decide between Ferdy, Rachel and an amusing assortment of applicants for Warren's old room. 'Men behaving sadly'; Jo and Miles treat themselves to a facial, Ferdy tries to speak with Mia but ends up losing his cool when he discovers she has met someone else, Egg and Milly are feeling the strain as they struggle to spend time together. Cast also includes Ramon Tikaram.
